TAVG.name: AIR TEMPERATURE AVERAGE
TAVG.description: Average Air Temperature - Sub-Hourly Sampling Frequency

TMAX.name: AIR TEMPERATURE MAXIMUM
TMAX.description: Maximum Air Temperature - Sub-Hourly Sampling Frequency

TMIN.name: AIR TEMPERATURE MINIMUM
TMIN.description: Minimum Air Temperature - Sub-Hourly Sampling Frequency

DPTP.name: DEW POINT TEMPERATURE
DPTP.description: Dew Point Temperature of the Air

SRDOX.name: DISCHARGE MANUAL/EXTERNAL ADJUSTED MEAN
SRDOX.description: Streamflow Discharge adjusted for significant human regulation.  Non-NRCS adjustment calculations

HFTV.name: ENERGY GAIN OR LOSS FROM GROUND
HFTV.physicalElementName: energy gain or loss from ground

SNDN.name: Snow Density
SNDN.description: The mass of snow per unit volume, expressed as a percent of water content

SNWDV.name: SNOW DEPTH AVERAGE
SNWDV.description: Average Snow Depth -daily (start of day) sampling frequency, serially complete data required

SNWDX.name: SNOW DEPTH MAXIMUM
SNWDX.description: Maximum Snow Depth -daily (start of day) sampling frequency, serially complete data required

SNWDN.name: SNOW DEPTH MINIMUM
SNWDN.description: Minimum Snow Depth -daily (start of day) sampling frequency, serially complete data required

SNRR.name: Snow Rain Ratio
SNRR.description: Daily or sum of daily snow water equivalent increases as pct of total precip for the same period

WTEQ.name: SNOW WATER EQUIVALENT
WTEQ.description: Depth of water that would theoretically result if the entire snowpack were melted instantaneously

WTEQV.name: SNOW WATER EQUIVALENT AVERAGE
WTEQV.description: Average Snow Water Equivalent - daily sampling frequency, serially complete data required

WTEQX.name: SNOW WATER EQUIVALENT MAXIMUM
WTEQX.description: Maximum Snow Water Equivalent - daily sampling frequency, serially complete data required

WTEQN.name: SNOW WATER EQUIVALENT MINIMUM
WTEQN.description: Minimum Snow Water Equivalent - daily sampling frequency, serially complete data required

SMV.name: SOIL MOISTURE PERCENT AVERAGE
SMV.description: Average Percent Soil Moisture by Volume - hourly sampling frequency, serially complete data required

SMX.name: SOIL MOISTURE PERCENT MAXIMUM
SMX.description: Maximum Percent Soil Moisture by Volume - hourly sampling frequency, serially complete data required

SMN.name: SOIL MOISTURE PERCENT MINIMUM
SMN.description: Minimum Percent Soil Moisture by Volume - hourly sampling frequency, serially complete data required

STV.name: SOIL TEMPERATURE AVERAGE
STV.description: Average Soil Temperature based on hourly sampling frequency; serially complete data required

STX.name: SOIL TEMPERATURE MAXIMUM
STX.description: Maximum Soil Temperature based on hourly sampling frequency; serially complete data required

STN.name: SOIL TEMPERATURE MINIMUM
STN.description: Maximum Soil Temperature based on hourly sampling frequency; serially complete data required

SRVO.name: STREAM VOLUME, ADJUSTED
SRVO.physicalElementName: stream flow volume adjusted for upstream projects
SRVO.description: Streamflow Volume adjusted for significant human regulation where data are available

SRVOX.name: STREAM VOLUME, ADJUSTED EXTERNAL
SRVOX.description: Streamflow Volume adjusted for significant human regulation.  Non-NRCS adjustment calculations

RESA.name: USABLE LAKE STORAGE VOLUME
RESA.description: Usable or active space occupied, as measured by cubic units, by water in a lake.

COOP.name: COOPERATOR PRECIP GAUGES
COOP.description: COOPERATOR PRECIPITATION NETWORK STATIONS, PREDOMINANTLY NOAA-NWS COOP STATIONS

OTHER.name: Other NRCS Hydromet
OTHER.description: TELEMETERED NRCS STATIONS THAT DO NOT MEET CRITIERIA FOR SNOTEL, SNOLITE, SCAN, or NRCS EXPERIMENTAL

SNTLT.name: SNOLITE
SNTLT.description: SNOW TELEMETRY NETWORK STATIONS, LIMITED SENSORS

SNOW.name: SNOW COURSE/AERIAL MARKER
SNOW.description: SNOW COURSE AND AERIAL MARKER NETWORK STATIONS

micromole/m2/s.description: micromoles per meters squared per second
